## Checklist

**Code Quality**:
- [ ] Code follows style guidelines (ESLint passes)
- [ ] Code formatted with Prettier
- [ ] JSDoc added for new functions
- [ ] No console.log statements left in code
- [ ] No commented-out code

**Testing**:
- [ ] Manual testing completed
- [ ] Tests added for new functionality
- [ ] All tests passing
- [ ] No regressions introduced

**Documentation**:
- [ ] JSDoc comments added
- [ ] README updated (if directory structure changed)
- [ ] API docs updated (if endpoints changed)
- [ ] Code comments explain complex logic

**Accessibility**:
- [ ] ARIA labels added where needed
- [ ] Keyboard navigation works
- [ ] Focus indicators visible
- [ ] Screen reader tested (or labels verified)

**Security**:
- [ ] No sensitive data committed (tokens, keys, kennitalas)
- [ ] Input validation added
- [ ] Authentication/authorization checked
- [ ] CORS configured correctly (if API change)

- [ ] Environment variables changed: <!-- list variables -->
- [ ] Configuration changed: <!-- describe -->
